text: emotional reunion
back together after almost eight decades
apart Anna and Elizabeth were born in
1936 their unmarried mother was in
domestic service and couldn't afford to
keep both babies Ann was given up for
adoption and never knew she had a twin
until last year wanted to pinch what am
i dreamin i've got someone someone from
it you know it's what is me you know is
Elizabeth knew she had a long-lost
sister but she never thought they'd be
reunited until she received a letter
from Anne's daughter
I saw oldest shot oh I did a double take
on that and opened it up and looked out
it and my eyes popped out my head the
sisters have agreed to take part in a
university study into the lives of
reunited twins we want to get a
comprehensive overview of their lives
their abilities their interests and
really put it all together as an
important case study because this is
really the world's longest separated
pair of twins for now Anne and Elizabeth
just want to get to know each other
better against the odds sisterly love
blossoming late in life
Pia DuBose BBC news in Fullerton
California
